tacokit@1.0.0-desc: A toolkit of plugins and platforms that works with Cordova CLI v5.1.1.
tacokit@2.0.0-desc: A toolkit of plugins and platforms that works with Cordova CLI v5.2.0.
_KitNames.comment: Localized names and descriptions for the different Cordova kits that taco-cli offers.
_TemplateName.comment: Localized display names for the available project templates. The users can specify a template when creating a Cordova project with taco-cli, and the localized name of the specified template is then printed as part of a summary / confirmation message after project creation.
TacoKitsExceptionKitMetadataFileNotFound: Error: The kit metadata file is not found. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm.
_TacoKitsExceptionKitMetadataFileNotFoun: Error thrown when the TacoKitMetadata.json file is not found
TacoKitsExceptionKitMetadataFileMalforme: Error: The kit metadata file is corrupt. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm.
_TacoKitsExceptionKitMetadataFileMalform: Error thrown when the TacoKitMetadata.json is malformed
TacoKitsExceptionInvalidKit: Error: {0} is not a known Kit. Please run 'taco kit list' for the list of known kits.
_TacoKitsExceptionInvalidKit.comment: Error shown when the user specifies an unknown kit identifier. {0} is the kit identifier that the user specified as parameter in the command line.
_TacoKitsExceptionDeprecatedKitWarning.c: Error shown when the user specifies a kit that is deprecated.
TacoKitsExceptionDeprecatedKitMessage: Consider changing your project to use a more recent Kit. For deprecation information, see <link>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=618170</link>
_TacoKitsExceptionDeprecatedKitMessage.c: Helpful message shown when the user specifies deprecated kit identifier.
TacoKitsExceptionNoDefaultKit: Error: No default kit found. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm or run "taco kit list" to see the list of available kits
_TacoKitsExceptionNoDefaultKit.comment: Error thrown when no default kit is specified in the kit metadata file, TacoKitMetadata.json
TacoKitsExceptionNoCliSpecification: Error: No Cordova CLI specification is found for kit {0}. The kit metadata file appears to be corrupt. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm or run "taco kit list" to see the list of available kits
_TacoKitsExceptionNoCliSpecification.com: Error thrown when no Cordova CLI is specified for the kit {0} in the kit metadata file, TacoKitMetadata.json
_TacoKitsExceptionInvalidTemplate.commen: Error shown when the user specifies an unknown template identifier. {0} is the template identifier that the user specified as parameter in the command line.
TacoKitsExceptionTypescriptNotSupported: Error: This version of Cordova does not contain a TypeScript template
_TacoKitsExceptionTypescriptNotSupported: Error shown when the user specifies a TypeScript template, but there is no such template available for the selected kit.
